-spec number_of_points(Nums :: [[integer()]]) -> integer().
number_of_points(Nums) ->
    Sorted = lists:sort(fun([A1, _], [B1, _]) -> A1 < B1 end, Nums),
    Merged = merge_intervals(Sorted, []),
    lists:foldl(fun([Start, End], Acc) -> Acc + (End - Start + 1) end, 0, Merged).

merge_intervals([], Acc) ->
    lists:reverse(Acc);
merge_intervals([Head|Tail], []) ->
    merge_intervals(Tail, [Head]);
merge_intervals([[Start, End] | Tail], [[AccStart, AccEnd] | AccTail]) when Start =< AccEnd + 1 ->
    NewEnd = erlang:max(End, AccEnd),
    merge_intervals(Tail, [[AccStart, NewEnd] | AccTail]);
merge_intervals([Head | Tail], Acc) ->
    merge_intervals(Tail, [Head | Acc]).
